author: Phil McCausland
title: 'This is tyranny': Protesters in Texas, other states demand end to lockdowns
description: Protesters opposed to their state's lockdown orders gathered outside state capitols and in the streets across the country on Saturday, fewer than 24 hours after President Donald Trump encouraged them online with a series of tweets.
content:
Protesters demanding an end to shutdown orders gathered in streets and outside several states' capitol buildings on Saturday, a day after President Donald Trump posted a series of tweets calling for demonstrators to "LIBERATE" certain states.
Some at the dem… [+2632 chars]
